extendedIngredients.originalName: PHILADELPHIA 1/3 Less Fat than Cream Cheese

title: Creamy Cranberry-Stuffed Celery
summary: Creamy Cranberry-Stuffed Celery is a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian side dish. One serving contains 78 calories, 2g of protein, and 4g of fat. This recipe serves 5 and costs 51 cents per serving. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 5 minutes. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. Head to the store and pick up celery, cranberries, philadelphia 1/3 less fat than cream cheese, and a few other things to make it today. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 23%. This score is not so amazing. Similar recipes include Cranberry and Celery Relish, Creamy Celery Soup, and Creamy celery gratin.
instructions: Mix reduced-fat cream cheese and cranberries.                                            Press into hollow centers of celery.                                            Cut each stalk crosswise into 4 pieces.

steps.step: Mix reduced-fat cream cheese and cranberries.
Press into hollow centers of celery.
Cut each stalk crosswise into 4 pieces.
